line: Ranger come in.

Captain Rush checking in sir.
 My Team are ready for tasking.

Glad to have you Captain.
 We have found Krakens in this sector!!

We must destroy them to keep
 the surrounding Zethos planets safe.

Your objective is to
 pass through all the zones.

We will use your locator beacons
 to strike the areas you pass through.

Copy. My Team and I will
 complete the objective.
For the Superior!
For the Superior.

Right Team Ammo Check 
 before we head into the next battle?

Plenty of Ammo Sir. Ceartainly
 enough for the blasphemers sir.

Easy Batu. They were once soldiers
 too, Don't let your rage blind you.
Yes Sir!
Ammo Reserves are optimal sir.

Good. Lets get moving and
 don't let the krakens get close.

Come in Command. We have
 advanced to the next sector.
Outstanding work Captain.

We have spotted what
 appears to be a base.

We need your team to
 infiltrate and plant our flag.

It will be done in
 the name of the SUPERIOR!!

Alright team.
 Command has found a base
How far away Sir?

Not Far. Orders are
 to take control of the base
